alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 9:22PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Campbell, northwestern Weston and Crook Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 921 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of New Haven to 9 miles southwest of Moorcroft. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Moorcroft, Pine Haven, Hulett, Alva, Carlile, Oshoto, New Haven, Rozet, Devils Tower National Monument, Warren Peak, Bear Lodge Campground, Cook Lake, Devils Tower Junction and Keyhole Reservoir. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 135 and 181. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston; Wyoming Black Hills
